note_template:
---
# Mandatory fields
id: "${id}"
# Optional fields
title: "${title}"
tags: ${tags}
source: "${source}"
source_title: "${source_title}"
source_description: "${source_description}"
source_image_url: "${source_image_url}"
created_date: "${created_date}"
modified_date: "${last_modified_date}"
---
${content}
